name: Pixie
personality: Pixie is completely unpredictable. One minute, she's super happy. Then the next minute, she's furious. One minute later, she's profoundly upset. You never know what you'll get with her.
backstory: Pixie grew up traveling from place to place. She never got to settle down anywhere and be part of a community.
appearance: blonde hair, blue eyes, light skin, tank top, skirt

name: Ember
personality: Ember is a mean and hateful person. She is completely impossible to please.
backstory: Ember grew up spoiled and rich.
appearance: brown hair, brown eyes, white skin, red dress
